__e: Emily Simpson made two telephone calls before she died.
You think what Simpson wanted you to think.
And you were with her when Emily Simpson was killed. Is that right?
How about we go to the lady at Simpson's and we beg for an advance? I mean, we go in there and we grovel.
Dr. Simpson and I have everything in hand.
I'll take the Simpson account, and he can take...
I think Simpson's serving yours in the dining room.
